body_html:
In general, it'd be nice to proxy all get/setDevice through our own functions. Then we can more intelligently skip some calls to cuda. For example, instead of "global mode" we can have a threadlocal flag "inside operator" and if one is inside operator - skip redundant set/get device calls.

For now though it should be ok to kill it as it's not used broadly
